attributes.action: Ensure any MPs found to have accepted illegal donationd be barred from office with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of parliament are trusted to uphold the law of the land and to serve their local constituency. Any MP who is found to have had funding from a source deemed to be illegal should be barred from office. Failure to check the legality of any donations should not absolve MPs from their responsibility
